title: A photo taken in 2017 falsely shared as PM Modi grandly dressed on his visit to a hospital recently.
subtitle: The posted photo is two years old. It was taken in 2017 when PM Modi inaugurated Dickoya Glengairan Hospital in the Central Province of Sri Lanka.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A photo is being shared widely on social media with a claim that Modi dressed grandly on his visit to a hospital recently despite the COVID-19 pandemic in the country. FACTLY has found that the photo is two years old. It was taken in 2017 in Sri Lanka when PM Modi inaugurated Dickoya Glengairan Hospital.

Did you watch our new video?
